Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Input A DECLARE model represented as a Python dictionary with various constraint types existence absence response precedence succession chain constraints non coexistence etc Input A list of activity descriptions Goal Describe the underlying loan approval process in practical step by step terms based on the model Requirements Explain the process flow from start to finish Discuss how specific constraints enforce compliance and logic Connect rules to real world motivations regulatory risk etc Speculate on consequences of violations

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Deconstruct the DECLARE Model Constraint Analysis Existence Receive Application must happen Gather Additional Documents must happen Absence Proceed Without Compliance forbidden Exactly One Preliminary Credit Check happens exactly once Init Receive Application starting activity Responded Existence Assemble Loan Offer Package implies Quality Assurance Review Coexistence Gather Additional Documents with Authorize Contract Terms Response Receive Application leads to Preliminary Credit Check Precedence Quality Assurance Review before Authorize Contract Terms Succession Preliminary Credit Check followed by Gather Additional Documents

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Interpreting AltResponse Transfer Funds followed by Notify Customer AltPrecedence Notify Customer before Transfer Funds creating Notify Transfer Notify sequence AltSuccession Gather Additional Documents to Quality Assurance Review ChainResponse Assemble Loan Offer Package immediately to Transfer Funds ChainPrecedence Authorize Contract Terms immediately before Preliminary Credit Check Chainsuccession Quality Assurance Review immediately to Assemble Loan Offer Package Noncoexistence Transfer Funds and Receive Application Nonsuccession Notify Customer and Preliminary Credit Check Nonchainsuccession Authorize Contract Terms and Notify Customer

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypothesis The prompts DECLARE model might have keys targets swapped or non standard semantics especially chainprecedence Authorize before Credit Check contradicting business logic where credit check precedes authorization Hypothesis on loop Notify Transfer Notify due to altprecedence and altresponse Hypothesis on parallel paths from Quality Assurance Review

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Spotting contradictions Authorize Contract Terms immediately before Preliminary Credit Check but Preliminary Credit Check early in flow via response from Receive Application Succession Credit Check to Gather Documents but coexistence Gather with Authorize creates potential loop violating exactly one on Credit Check Noncoexistence Transfer Funds and Receive Application makes successful trace impossible since Receive is init

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Backtracking on interpretations Re evaluating chainprecedence as strict Authorize immediately precedes Credit Check assuming standard DECLARE Target preceded by Key Adjusting flow QA precedes Authorize Authorize to Credit Check Credit Check to Gather Gather coexists with Authorize Interpreting noncoexistence as mutual exclusion or no overlap not full trace ban Interpreting nonsuccession as directional Notify not followed by Credit Check

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Constructing process flow Receive Application init then response to Preliminary Credit Check but adjusted for chainprecedence QA to Authorize to Credit Check to Gather Documents parallel QA to Assemble to Transfer Funds Notify sandwich around Transfer Notify before Transfer before Notify Speculating on weird ordering as verification workflow post authorization

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Checking flow against constraints Receive to Check satisfied QA to Authorize precedence Authorize to Check chainprecedence Check to Gather succession Gather Authorize coexistence QA Assemble Transfer chain constraints Notify Transfer Notify alt constraints Noncoexistence as separation guardrail Nonsuccession prevents Notify then Check

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Narrative plan Describe step by step acknowledging model oddities like Authorize before Credit Check as strict verification Explain constraints motivations regulatory compliance fraud prevention Discuss consequences of violations risk operational issues Frame response as model dictates unusual but compliant sequence
